/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The buildings, painted in a striking shade of red, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The street is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and movement in this part of the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature and architecture, the hustle and bustle of the streets, and the vibrant energy of the city.
